pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Documents Utils## UsageMake sure `libreoffice` is installed.Install docplus```pip install --user docplus```Run API Servier```python -m docplus```## APIs### Format Convertuse httpie, convert to pdf``` http POST -f :5000/convert_to/pdf file@~/demo.docx```use httpie, convert to html``` http POST -f :5000/convert_to/html file@~/demo.docx```
